name: Torcorvion II: Heart's Vengeance
description:
This is the second game I have ever coded on my own. Set in the universe I am slowly putting down onto "paper", this game follows the story of a young man whose elven wife is kidnapped right in front of him, as he hunts down the mysterious perpetrator.

It is not related to the first game, Alikaster, and has no cross-overs or references that you would need to have played the first game to understand.

In the future, there will be games/stories released that do have crossovers, and ultimately all the stories are within the same universe. 

WARNING: Because of the only way I really know how to compile my code into an exe, and given the fact that it runs in the Windows Command Line, Windows Defender often sees this as a Virus - but I promise it is not. I have had several people install this on their machines, and the most that happens is that it generates a new txt file called "load.txt" when you make a Save file.
